data.title: Carrie Gibson
data.meta_description: This is the home page's excerpt
data.text:
I’m the author of Empire’s Crossroads: A History of the Caribbean from Columbus to the Present Day (2014). I now have a new book – El Norte: The Epic and Forgotten Story of Hispanic North America – that is out now in the United States, the UK and Ireland, and Australia and New Zealand. El Norte was shortlisted for the Mark Lynton History Prize in January 2020.

¡Se puede leer El Norte en español!

You can download the entire bibliography here, in Word or PDF formats.

Click on the links at the top or side of the page (and then scroll down) to find out more about my journalism and academic work as a historian of the Caribbean and Latin America. Alternatively, you can have a look at my LinkedIn profile for a detailed CV.

I can also be found on Facebook and you’re more than welcome to follow me on Twitter or Instagram. Feel free to contact me using this form.
